item.title: I-90 West - Exits 282B and 282A
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 282B- 2nd Ave. Approaching Exit 282A - WA-290/Trent Ave./Hamilton St. Overhead for US-2 West and US-395 south traffic.

item.title: WA-290 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-290 west. Taken at the Idaho-Washington border.

item.title: WA-290 East/To ID-53 East at Wellsley Ave
item.description: WA-290/To ID-53/Rathdrum at the intersection of Trent Ave. and Wellesley Ave.

item.title: WA-290 East - Use right lane for WA-290/To-ID-53/Rathdrum
item.description: Use right lane for WA-290/To ID-53/Rathdrum on WA-290/Trent Ave. east at Wellesley Ave.

item.title: WA-290 East/To ID-53 Approaching Wellsley Ave
item.description: WA-290 East/To ID-53 approaching Wellesley Ave./Otis Orchards. Use left lane for Wellesley Ave.

item.title: End WA-27 North At WA-290
item.description: WA-27 north approaching WA-290/Trent Ave. This is the northern end of WA-27. The southern end of WA-27 is in Pullman.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 282 - Coeur d'Alene Overhead
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 282 - WA-290 East/Trent Ave./Hamilton St. Overhead for I-90 East to Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 282
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 282 - WA-290/Trent Ave./Hamilton Street. I-90 East to Coeur d’Alene (ID) overheads.
